      • setExpirationCheckInterval

        public void setExpirationCheckInterval(int expirationCheckInterval)
        Set how often (in ms) this Manager should check for all the Textures' expiration. By default, it doesn't check at all.
        Parameters:
        expirationCheckInterval -
        See Also:
        Texture.#setExpirationTime(int)
